text:
e="preserve">Peter John Hampton (12 September 195425 September 2020) was an English footballer. He played as a left back in the Football League for Leeds United, Stoke City, Burnley, Rochdale and Carlisle United. His career began in 1972 and he retired in 1988. Hampton was born in Oldham, Greater Manchester.
Hampton died on 25 September 2020 in Cyprus at the age of 66.
